name: Bright Minds Learning Center
shortDescription: Specialized support for children with dyslexia
longDescription: Bright Minds Learning Center offers comprehensive dyslexia support programs tailored to each child's needs. Our certified specialists use evidence-based methods to help children improve reading, writing, and spelling skills.

name: Focus Forward ADHD Coaching
longDescription: Focus Forward provides one-on-one coaching for children and teens with ADHD. We help students develop organizational skills, focus strategies, and self-advocacy techniques to succeed in school and life.

name: Spectrum Success Academy
shortDescription: Specialized programs for children on the autism spectrum
longDescription: Spectrum Success Academy offers a supportive environment for children with ASD. Our programs focus on social skills development, communication strategies, and sensory integration techniques.

name: Learning Bridges
shortDescription: Comprehensive support for various learning challenges
longDescription: Learning Bridges provides individualized educational support for children with a wide range of learning difficulties. Our team assesses each child's needs and creates customized learning plans.

name: Speech & Language Pathways
shortDescription: Expert speech and language therapy services
longDescription: Our certified speech-language pathologists work with children experiencing speech delays, articulation disorders, and language processing difficulties. We offer both individual and group therapy sessions.
